data.comment: The big names in today's match at Bramall Lane have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Sheffield.
In the minute 1, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sheffield in Sheffield.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Chris Basham for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 5, Goal! David McGoldrick gives Sheffield a 1-0 lead.
Oliver Burke instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Man Utd at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 7, Play has been interrupted briefly in Sheffield to check on Sander Berge, who is grimacing with pain.
Michael Oliver awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Sander Berge for Sheffield is back on the field again.
In the minute 12, Sheffield needs to be cautious. Man Utd have an attacking throw-in.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
It seems as if Sander Berge is unable to continue. Phil Jagielka replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 14, Michael Oliver blows against Man Utd's Anthony Martial for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sheffield.
Man Utd's Anthony Martial is whistled for offside at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 16, Man Utd have a goal kick.
In Sheffield Sheffield attack through John Fleck. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 17, Man Utd's Marcus Rashford has run offside.
Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Man Utd are coming forward and Marcus Rashford gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 19, Marcus Rashford for Man Utd is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Man Utd.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 20, Michael Oliver awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oliver Burke is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 22, Oliver Burke has recovered and rejoins the match in Sheffield.
Man Utd's Marcus Rashford attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Sheffield.
Free kick Man Utd.
Goal! Marcus Rashford levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 26, That's a fine assist from Victor Lindelof.
Anthony Martial for Man Utd drives towards goal at Bramall Lane. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Chris Basham's header is off-target for Sheffield.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sheffield.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 32, Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Anthony Martial of Man Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! Man Utd have got their heads in front thanks to a Anthony Martial strike.
In the minute 35, Man Utd pushes forward through Marcus Rashford, whose finish on goal is saved.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In the minute 37, Sheffield's David McGoldrick gets in a shot on goal at Bramall Lane. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Michael Oliver signals a Man Utd throw-in in Sheffield's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Sheffield.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 43, Sheffield's David McGoldrick gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Sheffield drives forward and Oliver Burke gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sheffield's David McGoldrick misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 45, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Sheffield.
The first half has been concluded at Bramall Lane.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Man Utd.
Free kick Man Utd.
In the minute 48, Anthony Martial (Man Utd) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Michael Oliver awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 49, Mason Greenwood (Man Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Michael Oliver signals a Sheffield throw-in in Man Utd's half.
At Bramall Lane, Phil Jagielka has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Man Utd take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Marcus Rashford.
In the minute 51, Anthony Martial with an assist there.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Sheffield push forward at Bramall Lane and Oliver Burke gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man Utd defence.
In the minute 52, Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 54, In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Bruno Fernandes for Man Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Sheffield's area.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
In the minute 62, Michael Oliver signals a Sheffield throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Phil Jagielka with Lys Mousset. This is the second substitution made today by Chris Wilder.
Sheffield drive forward but Chris Basham is judged offside.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Man Utd's Mason Greenwood is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
In the minute 68, Throw-in Sheffield.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man Utd.
Sheffield's John Egan has been booked in Sheffield.
In the minute 71, Man Utd drive upfield and Marcus Rashford gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
Throw-in for Man Utd at Bramall Lane.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
In the minute 72, Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Sheffield.
Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 73, Nemanja Matic of Man Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Chris Wilder (Sheffield) is making a third substitution, with Rhian Brewster replacing Oliver Burke.
In the minute 74, Juan Mata is on a sub for Mason Greenwood for Man Utd.
Anthony Martial (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 77, Sheffield drives forward and Lys Mousset gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Sheffield Man Utd drive forward through Juan Mata. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Man Utd make their second substitution with Donny van de Beek replacing Bruno Fernandes.
Can Sheffield capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 83, Sheffield drive upfield and Rhian Brewster gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Sheffield attack but John Egan's header doesn't find the target.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
David McGoldrick (Sheffield) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-3 at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 88, Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 89, Man Utd needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sheffield's Lys Mousset is on target but unsuccessful.
Michael Oliver signals a Sheffield throw-in in Man Utd's half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Man Utd.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man Utd.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is making the team's third substitution at Bramall Lane with Scott McTominay replacing Anthony Martial.
Dean Henderson for Man Utd has been booked by Michael Oliver and receives a first yellow card.
Jack Robinson (Sheffield) gets a yellow card.
Paul Pogba (Man Utd) has received a yellow card from Michael Oliver.
